article.title: GD Supports U.S and Australian Tactical Control Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: General Dynamics Advanced Information Systems Incorporated, Fairfax, Virginia, is being awarded a $27,876,524 cost-plus-incentive-fee modification to previously awarded contract for engineering and technical services in support of the AN/BYG-1 Tactical Control System for U.S. Navy and Royal Australian Navy submarines.Â The Naval Sea Systems Command, Washington, DC, is the contracting activity.
